recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups all-purpose flour
2 tablespoons sugar
2 teaspoons baking powder
1/2 teaspoon salt
2 eggs
1 1/2 cups milk
2 tablespoons butter, melted
recipes.instructions:
1. Mix dry ingredients in a bowl
2. Whisk eggs, milk, and melted butter
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients
4. Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form
5. Flip and cook until golden brown

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients:
2 chicken breasts
1 head romaine lettuce
1/2 cup Caesar dressing
1/4 cup grated parmesan
1 cup croutons
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
1. Grill chicken breasts until cooked through
2. Chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces
3. Slice chicken into strips
4. Toss lettuce with dressing
5. Top with chicken, parmesan, and croutons

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients:
500g ground beef
1 onion, diced
2 cloves garlic, minced
400g canned tomatoes
2 tablespoons tomato paste
500g spaghetti
Fresh basil
Salt and pepper
recipes.instructions:
1. Brown beef in a large pan
2. Add onion and garlic, cook until soft
3. Add tomatoes and tomato paste
4. Simmer for 30 minutes
5. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
6. Serve sauce over pasta with fresh basil

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients:
2 1/4 cups flour
1 cup butter, softened
3/4 cup sugar
3/4 cup brown sugar
2 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla
2 cups chocolate chips
recipes.instructions:
1. Cream butter and sugars
2. Add eggs and vanilla
3. Mix in flour and chocolate chips
4. Drop onto baking sheet
5. Bake at 375Â°F for 10-12 minutes

recipes.title: Guacamole
recipes.ingredients:
3 avocados
1 lime, juiced
1/2 onion, diced
2 tomatoes, diced
1/4 cup cilantro
Salt to taste
recipes.instructions:
1. Mash avocados in a bowl
2. Add lime juice
3. Mix in onion, tomatoes, and cilantro
4. Season with salt
5. Serve with tortilla chips

recipes.title: Fresh Lemonade
recipes.ingredients:
4 lemons
1 cup sugar
4 cups water
Ice cubes
Mint leaves (optional)
recipes.instructions:
1. Juice the lemons
2. Make simple syrup with sugar and 1 cup water
3. Combine lemon juice, syrup, and remaining water
4. Add ice and mint leaves
5. Stir and serve
